name: Super Pac Twins
overview: An exciting two-player Much 'em up! SUPER PAC TWINS was started in 1995. It featured in later issues of Commodore Format. But when an unfinished, early demo was controversially included on the magazine’s covertape against the author’s wishes, the project was pulled. This deluxe version of the game by Paul Kubiszyn and Richard Bayliss was eventually released as an exclusive to Commodore Power Pack 62.
